allow: Bash(winpty docker exec -it dex_postgres psql -U postgres -d dex_analytics -c "\dt")

Bash(winpty docker exec -it dex_postgres psql -U postgres -d dex_analytics -c "SELECT ''Pair Stats'' as source, total_volume_24h as volume_24h, timestamp FROM moralis_pair_stats_correct ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 1;")
